data.title: Modesto, California
data.meta_description: Welcome to our Welcome page. Contact Pelandale Dental today at (209) 545-9282 or visit our office servicing Modesto, California
data.text:
Skip main content

Pelandale Dental Care

Dr. Param Gill has over 25 years of clinical experience in all aspects of dentistry. We are the only dental practice in Modesto area to offer Robot enabled dental Implant surgery with YOMI robot. You can come in for a free consult for dental implants and leave with your teeth the same day. Dr Gill is an expert in laser periodontics with state of the art, Lightwalker hard and soft tissue dental laser. Dr Gill is certified in LANAP laser treatment for advanced periodontal disease with Periolase. Laser surgeries are painless and there is no down time. Our practice is focused on Cosmetic, Implant, Orthodontics, Laser and Family dentistry. Our lifelong goal has been to bring affordable and predictable dental care to our patients. In addition to being a well-known Implant dentist, Param is an award winning film writer and director, known for directing films which tackle diverse themes. His films are available on Netflix, Amazon and in theaters near you. Please feel free to swing by the office and grab your free copy of Dr Gill's recent book. This book is written for all the current and prospective dental implant patients to fully understand the process of dental Implants and follow up care. The book lays special emphasis on how to take care of your dental implants so that they last you a lifetime.

When you visit our office you will experience all that modern dentistry has to offer, including a comprehensive list of general, restorative and cosmetic dental services to meet the needs of the whole family. Our goal is to assist each patient in achieving and maintaining long term dental health and a beautiful smile.

Some of the services we provide include:

Cleanings & Exams (New / Established Patients)

Metal / Ceramic Braces and Clear Aligners (Invisalign / Clear Correct)

High quality Dental Implants (Straumann, Nobel Biocare etc)

Robot enabled dental implant surgery with YOMI robot

LANAP Laser Treatment (Gum disease / Failing Implants)

Root Canal Treatment (Laser guided / Microscope)

Aesthetic Dentures & Partials (Metal free / Flexible materials)

Teeth Whitening (Chairside / Home bleaching)

Tooth Colored Fillings (Mercury free holistic dentistry)

Cosmetic dentistry (Complete smile makeover)

Dental Emergencies (Same day emergency care)

Part of our commitment to serving our patients includes providing information that helps them to make more informed decisions about their oral health needs. This website is a resource we hope youâ€™ll find both useful and interesting.

Please browse through our website and be sure to contact us if you have any questions or would like to schedule an appointment. You may use our online appointment request form to schedule your appointment.
